user_question: How can I grow a bonsai tree from scratch and generate an image of a bonsai tree in a zen garden?
final_answer: To grow a bonsai tree from scratch: 1) Choose a tree species suitable for bonsai. 2) Obtain seeds or a young plant. 3) Plant in a small pot with well-draining soil. 4) Prune roots and branches regularly. 5) Water and fertilize appropriately. 6) Shape using wiring techniques. Image of a bonsai tree in a zen garden generated. The best tree species for beginners are Ficus, Chinese Elm, and Juniper.
